column1: Local Foods////I have only really found one side that I liked which was the green olive salad.  I have tried the slaw with edamame - the first time I had it
column2: there was an overpowering sesame oil flavor.  I tried it again
column3: and that was not the case.  The white bean salad is dense and in my opinion
column4: needs salt.  Even the chips were too greasy.... They are house made
column5: but that doesn't mean that they are good.
